name: Arcturus (itch) (JamesSired)
description:
In the harshness of space you must protect your little asteroid from immediate peril by outfitting it with the strongest weapons money can buy. Survive wave after wave of enemy spaceships until you are rescued!  Game Jam project in the Global Game Jam 2018. 

Credits:

Programmer- James Sired: https://www.linkedin.com/in/james-sired-314a06173/

Programmer- Mohammad Sahlehi
